entry.title: Wasp - language for developing full-stack Javascript web apps with no boilerplate
entry.id: Wasp - language for developing full-stack Javascript web apps with no boilerplate

entry.title: Hello Wasp!
entry.summary: About a year or so ago, brother and I started discussing how awesome it would be to have a programming language that would understand what “web app” means. Such language would, on one hand, serve as an expressive specification of the web app, while on the other hand, it would take care of “boring” work for us, while we could focus on the business logic specific for our web app.
